name: Blob & Steel
description:
Blob & Steel is a student project made in the span of 5-6 months by:

Rodrigo Martín: as Director, Producer, Level designer and Programmer.

Borja Pons: as Concept artist, background artist, and Animator.

Javier Coronado: as Concept artist, background artist, UI designer and Rigging artist.

Alfonso Moreno and Raúl Luquero : as Modellers and Shading artists.

Jaime Moya: as Audio Library researcher.
